mapper.sql: num, writer, title, content, viewCount, to_char(regdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd am hh:mi') as regdate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_cafe(num, writer, title, content, viewCount) VALUES (board_cafe_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCount})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM board_cafe ORDER BY num DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT FROM board_cafe ORDER BY num DESC) result1 ) WHERE rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}
